sentence: We often borrow books from the ______.
sentence_translation: 我们经常从图书馆借书。

sentence: Students usually have lunch in the school ______.
sentence_translation: 学生们通常在学校食堂吃午饭。

sentence: Freshmen live in the new ______ on campus.
sentence_translation: 新生住在校园的新宿舍里。

sentence: The new ______ displays works by local artists.
sentence_translation: 这座新美术馆展出当地艺术家的作品。

sentence: The park is ______ from here, so we need to take a bus.
sentence_translation: 公园离这里很远，所以我们需要坐公交车。

sentence: The ______ checked the article for grammar errors.
sentence_translation: 编辑检查了这篇文章的语法错误。

sentence: She attends ______ classes three times a week to keep fit.
sentence_translation: 她每周参加三次健美操课来保持健康。

sentence: He completed a summer ______ at a software company.
sentence_translation: 他在一家软件公司完成了暑期实习。

sentence: The research project received ______ from the government.
sentence_translation: 这个研究项目得到了政府的资助。

sentence: The door ______ opens when someone approaches.
sentence_translation: 有人靠近时，门会自动打开。

sentence: The basketball match will be held in the ______ tomorrow.
sentence_translation: 篮球赛明天将在体育馆举行。

sentence: The tree stands ______ in winter without leaves.
sentence_translation: 这棵树冬天没有叶子，光秃秃的。

sentence: She goes to the ______ to wash her clothes every weekend.
sentence_translation: 她每周去洗衣房洗衣服。

sentence: Important notices are posted on the school ______.
sentence_translation: 重要通知贴在学校公告栏上。

sentence: We need to ______ all risks before starting the project.
sentence_translation: 我们需要在启动项目前消除所有风险。

sentence: He applied for permanent ______ in this country.
sentence_translation: 他申请了这个国家的永久居住权。

sentence: Please ______ that all doors are locked before leaving.
sentence_translation: 离开前请确保所有门都锁好了。

sentence: The workers will ______ a new air-conditioner in the office.
sentence_translation: 工人们将在办公室安装一台新空调。

sentence: They plan to ______ the old building into a modern library.
sentence_translation: 他们计划把这座旧建筑翻新成现代化图书馆。

sentence: The ______ orientation will help new students adapt to college life.
sentence_translation: 新生入学指导将帮助新生适应大学生活。

sentence: An ______ volunteered to guide the freshmen around campus.
sentence_translation: 一名高年级学生自愿带新生参观校园。

sentence: The ______ ______ will answer questions about the application process.
sentence_translation: 招生官将解答关于申请流程的问题。

sentence: Internships help students ______ ______ ______ paths.
sentence_translation: 实习帮助学生探索潜在职业路径。

sentence: The company is ______ ______ ______ bankruptcy due to poor management.
sentence_translation: 由于管理不善，这家公司濒临破产。

sentence: You need to pay the ______ ______ when applying for the course.
sentence_translation: 申请这门课程时你需要支付注册费。

sentence: The workshop encourages ______ ______ ______ ______ industry experts.
sentence_translation: 这个研讨会鼓励和行业专家互动、社交。

sentence: A good command of English will ______ ______ ______ when traveling abroad.
sentence_translation: 熟练掌握英语在出国旅行时会派上用场。

sentence: The career center offers ______ ______ to help students prepare for job hunting.
sentence_translation: 职业发展中心提供模拟面试，帮助学生准备求职。

sentence: We parked our car in the ______ ______ near the shopping mall.
sentence_translation: 我们把车停在购物中心附近的停车场。

sentence: Many students ride bikes to ______ ______ ______ ______ every day.
sentence_translation: 许多学生每天骑自行车往返上课。

sentence: The museum is open ______ ______ ______ on weekends.
sentence_translation: 这家博物馆周末免费开放。

sentence: Students can use the ______ ______ to finish their assignments.
sentence_translation: 学生们可以使用机房完成作业。

sentence: The ______ ______ provides resume writing services for students.
sentence_translation: 职业发展中心为学生提供简历撰写服务。

sentence: Even small actions can ______ ______ ______ in protecting the environment.
sentence_translation: 即使是小行动也能在保护环境方面起作用。

sentence: Adding more facilities will ______ ______ ______ ______ the park.
sentence_translation: 增加更多设施将提升公园的吸引力。

sentence: He decided to ______ ______ for a year to travel around the world.
sentence_translation: 他决定延迟入学一年，去环游世界。

sentence: You can print your thesis at the campus ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 你可以在校园打印中心打印论文。

sentence: Taking a ______ ______ before college can help students gain life experience.
sentence_translation: 上大学前度过一个间隔年能帮助学生获得生活经验。

sentence: Many students rely on ______ ______ from their parents to pay tuition.
sentence_translation: 许多学生依靠父母的经济支持来支付学费。

sentence: The university holds an open day for ______ ______ ______ every spring.
sentence_translation: 这所大学每年春天为准新生举办开放日。

sentence: We should ______ ______ some money each month for emergencies.
sentence_translation: 我们应该每月留出一些钱以备不时之需。

sentence: It's better to book the tickets ______ ______ during peak season.
sentence_translation: 旺季时最好提前订票。

sentence: The Great Wall is a famous ______ ______ in China.
sentence_translation: 长城是中国著名的景点。

sentence: The ______ ______ in the classroom is bright enough for reading.
sentence_translation: 教室里的顶灯足够亮，适合阅读。

sentence: The ______ keeps the office cool in summer.
sentence_translation: 空调在夏天使办公室保持凉爽。

sentence: The software uses ______ ______ that can be changed by users.
sentence_translation: 这款软件使用默认设置，用户可以更改。
